resources.string: The device does not has NFC hardware.
GPS on this device seems to be switched off. The measurement will automatically be deleted on this device. Please delete it from the Reader device as well.
The tag was lost! No data will be saved.
The Bluetooth on this device seems to be switched off. The measurement will automatically be deleted on this device. Please delete it from the Reader device as well.
The WiFi on this device seems to be switched off. The measurement will automatically be deleted on this device. Please delete it from the Reader device as well.
You are using a not-associated Card!
The connection with the Card was lost. No data will be saved!
You cannot proceed without granting all the required permissions!
This sensor does not seem to be supported on this device!
The card is still in the previous transaction.
"There was a problem with the card: "
